title: PowerShop - Favorite Name is not displayed completely
author: Akshay Vaibhav
content:
Current Functionality:
User is having an issue related to the display of the Favorite Name in the DC. 
Curre
Currently there is a character limit, post which .... is added after the name, and the user has to hover over the name to get the complete name.
Customer has pointed out that there is white space which is not utilised, due to which there is empty space which can be seen in the image.
 
To be functionality:
The character limit to be increased, so that user has less whitespace and can see increased number of characters when they go to favorites.

title: Digital Commerce: When deleting a list of favorite, please make sure to have a warning message before deleting the entry
author: Swapnil Bhandarkar
content: Hello, currently in digital commerce when we try to delete a favorite, there is no warning message/question asked to user before deleting the entry. Can we add this enhancement such that there should a confirmation dialog box displayed before deletion?

comments.content: Bulk actions like these are achievable via slight tweaks to the frontend templates. We have noted this requirement and will slot this in our upcoming releases on Conga Platform.

title: Ability to retain the Search Text in Digital Commerce
author: Swapnil Bhandarkar
content:
Hi team,
 
Currently on Digital Commerce, on Product Catalog page we have a search bar where we can type the search text (pls see image 1).Here, when we search with some text I see the suggestions of product in the dropdown (image 2).When we click enter with some search text in search box, it takes the user to new url ( for example in Hitachi Energy, this is the url https://hitachienergy--sfdcstage.sandbox.my.site.com/MVP#/search/test).Here, if there are any products they would appear in the filtered list, if there are not product matching the searched text criteria then we see ‘No records found’.However, in both cases the search text is not preserved in the search box. (Image 3 and 4)Hence, there is no way for the user to go back to unfiltered product list so as to see all the products from the catalog.Hence, can we please get an enhancement for 
	Preserving the search text after enter is pressedBringing back user to entire product catalog (unfiltered product list), on clearing the search text.

comments.content: This is achievable via slight tweaks on the frontend template. In our out of the box example templates the search is in a popup modal which does not affect the page. However we have noted the requirement regarding retaining the searched for text in the search input area and will keep that in mind in our future enhancements on Conga Platform.

title: Ability to create order header first and then order line items in DC
author: Swapnil Bhandarkar
content: Ask from the customers is the ability to create order header first, and then have an async call which creates the order line items. Reason is when they are creating orders in DC, they don’t want the user to be blocked till the entire processing is done, which is currently happening.

title: Chatter is not supported by Digital Commerce SDK package
author: Swapnil Bhandarkar
content: Chatter is not supported by Digital Commerce SDK package, Can you please integrate chatter with DC package?

title: Ability to sort line items
author: Ben Racine
content: Not having the ability to sort line items is a usability/adoption issue. The AX is not able to validate the customer configuration without sorting capabilities. In addition, the customer is asking to see the contract config sorted a certain way which the AX is unable to provide

title: Auto Swap of option based on attribute and Asset option
author: Jiten Chandaria
content: Customer has use case to swap particular option if that option is already in asset and if customer selects particular attribute during Change (ABO operation) process. At present 'Match In Asset' doesn't work for auto exclusion, and SWAP doesn't work for Options, hence customer can not automate this usecase

title: API to create Ramps
author: SF Integration Service Account
content:
As of today, there is no API available to create Ramp lines. The only way to automate ramp creation is via Pricing callback. In SAAS industries, ramp is a common use case ex: Workday.


Instead of creating ramp lines in PCB it will be helpful if we can get an API to create ramp lines

title: In Constraint Rule Action  - Action Criteria for Client side rule
author: Jiten Chandaria
content: At present, Constraint rule allows to define Action Criteria in Action as 'Scope', where scope can be defined dynamically based on Product2 object fields. This feature works only on 'server' execution model and not 'Client'. Our client (Intuitive) is using client side execution mode and this feature is very much needed.

title: Buy X Get Y promotion support - support for multiple lines
author: Kalyanakrishnan Mohan
content:
Scenario: Buy X Get Y promotions. Multiple X and Y Products. Get a one-to-one mapping. When one X product is bought, one Y product should be the benefit. For two X products, two Y products must receive the benefit.

Steps to Reproduce

1. Create a quote.
2. Add/ Configure 795231
3. Select the product and click on Apply Promotions
4. Select E6MESP_CVX_3D and click on Apply.
5. Configure one more 795231.
6. Select E6MESP_CVX_3D and click on Apply.

Expected Result: For every instance of source product, corresponding benefit product should be selected.

Actual Result: Only the first match of the Y product is recognized.
